From: ' 
To:" 
Subject: RE: Forfeiture question 
Date: Tue, 15 Oct 2019 18:33:55 +0000 
Sorry, was in a meeting. How'd it go? 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, October 15, 2019 2:06 PM 
To: 
Subject: FW: Forfeiture question 
On the phone with him now—you're welcome to swing by, but it seems like this will be super short, so no worries. 
From: Matthew L. Schwartz .cz> 
Sent: Tuesday, October 15, 2019 1:56 PM 
To: 
I <> 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Forfeiture question 
I just freed up and can call you in a few minutes if that works. 
Matthew L. Schwartz 
(o) 
(m) 
On October 15, 2019 at 1:39:21 PM EDT, 
Matt, 
) < 
> wrote: 
With apologies: I now need to meet with a  witness starting at 4 today, so unfortunately 4:30 no longer works. 
Happy to talk between now and 4, or later this evening, if either works. Alternatively, I'm free at 9:30 
tomorrow morning, or between 11 a.m. and 1 p.m. tomorrow. 
Thanks, 
From: Matthew L Schwartz •c
: 
Sent: Monday, October 14, 2019 9:10 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Forfeiture question 
) <
4:30 is perfect. Where should I call? 
EFTA00021337

Matthew L. Schwartz 
(o) 
(m) 
On October 14, 2019 at 6:40:46 PM EDT, 
Hi Matt, 
) < 
> wrote: 
I'm available for a call tomorrow either at 1  p.m. or anytime from 4:30 onwards, if either of those windows 
works for 
you. 
Best, 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 13, 2019, at 8:23 PM, Matthew L. Schwartz > wrote: 
Thanks . If any of you have a moment for a forfeiture-related question in the next few days, please let 
me know. FYI, this has nothing to do with my firm's representation of certain victims. Thanks. 
-mis 
Matthew L. Schwartz 
(o) 
(m) 
On October 13, 2019 at 7:44:17 PM EDT, 
wrote: 
Hi Man, 
The Epstein case team are AUSAs and 
email. They're the right people to talk to about anything Epstein-related. 
, all cc'd on this 
Sent from my iPhone 
On

Do either of you guys or the appropriate other person have 2 minutes to discuss a somewhat time-
sensitive, but by no means urgent, Epstein-related forfeiture question in the next few days? 
Matthew L. Schwartz 
(o) 
(m)
